thumb.title: じん（自然の敵P） / Jin (Shizen no Teki-P) - Worlders - TOB English Cover
thumb.description: その映画は僕の国の映画館に来たのために長らく待ったけど、僕は中々嬉しいだ、そしてこの曲は見させたことの一部だ。It took a while for the movie to reach my country's cinemas, but I'm freaking glad it did, and this song is part of what got me wanting to watch the movie.追加解説 (EN) / Further Commentary (EN):https://wp.me/p3Rooj-2iV本家様 / The Great Original:Movie Version - so44965329BLUE BACK Version - sm44588693作曲作詞 / Composition and Lyrics: じん（自然の敵P) / Jin (Shizen no Teki-P)user/15872264https://jin-jin-suruyo.com編曲 / Arrangement: TeddyLoidhttps://www.teddyloid.com訳詞・ボーカル・字幕 / Translyrics, Vocals, and Subtitles: The Overlord Bear / TOB / Tobbymylist/47503366https://theoverlordbear.wordpress.com/ボーカルエディット・ミックス・マスタリング / Vocal Edit, Mix, and Mastering: Mihovoxhttps://vgen.co/mihovoxhttps://www.foriio.com/mihovoxmp3:https://bit.ly/4dvlZct歌詞テキスト / Lyrics Sheet:https://bit.ly/42PfkoD前回のニコニコ歌ってみた投稿 / Previous Niconico Song Cover Upload: Never Lost Word / 失想ワードsm43990470
